StatDef.label: Dungeon speed
StatDef.description:
A speed at which this person can navigate through a dungeon.

 As the pawn reaches a higher Intellectual level, Dungeon Yield increases as the pawn can explore deeper dungeons which have more loot, but Dungeon Speed decreases because it takes longer to loot higher level dungeons. Still, the average wealth gain versus the time cost is more efficient at higher levels than lower levels.

Dungeon speed can be enhanced by building Dungeon Upgrades (in Misc category).
